entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning except periods of snow inland and over higher terrain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
